abstract: Fritz A. Henderson, the General Motors chief executive who oversaw the carmaker’s quick trip through bankruptcy, has been hired as a contractor by AlixPartners, the consulting firm that worked with him on the company’s Chapter 11 plan, according to a court filing made on Friday.

lead_paragraph: Fritz Henderson, the General Motors chief executive who oversaw the carmaker’s quick trip through bankruptcy, has been hired as a contractor by AlixPartners, the consulting firm that worked with him on the company’s Chapter 11 plan, according to a court filing made on Friday.

headline.main: Ex-G.M. Chief Is Hired by AlixPartners

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
